Is a diet plan that is designed to help individuals maintain their current body weight.

Note: when we talk about water, we talk about other liquids too. So, if you have drunk milk, or ate a tomato, you may also add it to consumed water. But it would be better if at least half of all consumed liquids were water

Note: when discussing protein, it\'s important to prioritize a diverse range of protein sources in your diet. Incorporating lean meats, fish, poultry, legumes, nuts, and dairy products can help ensure an adequate protein intake. By diversifying your protein sources, you can provide your body with a wider array of essential amino acids and nutrients for optimal health.

Note: carbohydrates are important for energy. Include a variety of whole grains, fruits, vegetables, and legumes for essential fiber and nutrients. Choose minimally processed carbs and avoid excessive refined sugars and grains.

Note: healthy fats are important for overall health. Unsaturated fats, particularly monounsaturated and polyunsaturated fats, are considered better choices for overall health. These can be found in foods such as avocados, nuts, seeds, olive oil, fatty fish (like salmon and trout), and plant-based oils like canola and sunflower oil. Avoid excessive intake of saturated and trans fats found in processed foods.

Note: fiber is essential for a healthy diet. Choose whole grains, fruits, vegetables, legumes, and nuts for fiber intake. It aids digestion, promotes regularity, and helps control blood sugar levels. Gradually increase fiber intake and stay hydrated for optimal results.

Note: sugar consumption should be moderated for overall health. Limit intake of added sugars found in processed foods, sugary beverages, and desserts. Instead, focus on natural sugars from fruits. Be mindful of hidden sugars in packaged foods and opt for healthier alternatives.
Note: limit salt intake by reducing added salt and choosing fresh, whole foods. Processed foods are often high in sodium, so minimize their consumption for better salt regulation and overall health.
